title: Please help me identify this fonts. Thank you!
content:
Hi,  
Please help me identify this fonts.  
Thank you!

author: Jorge Peiró

comments.content:
Navajo: [Metroscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805100713/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/metroscript/) by Alphabet Soup Michael Doret  
Enemigo: close to [Gelateria](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805100713/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/gelateria) by Flat-it Ryoichi Tsunekawa
